Versions of external components
-------------------------------

This file lists versions of the external components we are using.

- POCO: 1.14.0
- boost: 1.88.0
- frhed: 0.10904.2017.18
- WinIMerge: 1.0.47.0
  - freeimage: 3.18.0
  - LibXDiff: 611e42a on Nov 2, 2018 (https://github.com/git/git/tree/master/xdiff)
- WinWebDiff: 1.0.20.0
  - WebView2: 1.0.1518.46
  - wil: 1.0.191107.2
  - rapidjson: 1.1.1
- Google C++ Testing Framework: 1.14.0
- GNU patch: 2.7.6-1
- 7-zip: 25.01
- LibXDiff: 611e42a on Nov 2, 2018 (https://github.com/git/git/tree/master/xdiff)
- html-tidy5: 5.4.0
- jq: 1.7.1
- wil: 209ff9c7e30e71bf6d1405557bf78544920f8157 on Sep 9, 2021
- md4c: 0.5.2
- darkmodelib: 9f273dad8f268d38e2ced5c8db06ff9676aa6a41 on Jul 4, 2025
